item.title: The Conscious Consumer
item.description: If you’re thinking of going vegan and you’ve made the choice to stop eating meat and other animal products, what about the clothes you buy? Perhaps you are ready for the next step – to go beyond just changing your diet and look at the other aspects of your life where you can reduce or eliminate the use of animal products.
